text: Yakhana musa sbajatike balalenah tomadera prati allahara anugraha smarana kara yakhana tini tomaderake phera'unera sampradayera kabala theke mukti dena. Tara tomaderake atyanta nikrsta dharanera sasti dita, tomadera chelederake hatya karata ebam tomadera meyederake jibita rakhata. Ebam ete tomadera palanakartara paksa theke birata pariksa hayechila.
